comments.body: Perhaps "By default this module uses the staging ACME directory." Then provide the full URL in the `default:` line.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +79,83 @@         server (for the ACME v1 protocol). This will create technically correct,
         but untrusted certificates."
      - "The default value is U(https://acme-staging.api.letsencrypt.org/directory).
         Note that in Ansible 2.14, this option *will be required* and will no longer
         have a default."
